attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
dear sir..  as our prisons are over flowing .. could you not set up somthing like americas prisons where they send out on a daily basis..chain gangs of men and women that are not high risk..to work on roads.. liter picking and weeding inbankments of motorways and thing's like that 

yours sincerly 

tim empson

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
